alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:08PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, west central Chambers and southeastern Harris Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shoreacres, or over La Porte, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Pasadena, northeastern League City, Baytown, Texas City, La Porte, Dickinson, Seabrook, Webster, Beach City, Kemah, eastern Clear Lake, Nassau Bay, Taylor Lake Village, El Lago, Shoreacres, Clear Lake Shores, Morgan`s Point, San Leon, The Johnson Space Center and Bacliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Galveston Bay, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
